trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANMAM108_05268_SEQ_00<tab>Kageel Ja wishes to provide an ideal habitat for branchbearers.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANMAM108_05268_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested materials to Kageel Ja.

TEXT_BANMAM108_05268_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Cenote Neyozzote)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Cenote Neyozzote)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> at Cenote Moxutural)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANMAM108_05268_KAGEELJA_000_001<tab>The branchbearers are hard at work fighting the pests that plague our garden. I want to give them everything they need to thrive.
TEXT_BANMAM108_05268_KAGEELJA_000_002<tab>Fortunately, the forest has all the materials we require. Might I count on you for their retrieval?

TEXT_BANMAM108_05268_KAGEELJA_000_003<tab>Thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'd be much obliged if you could extract a few vials of energy-imbued water from mineral deposits near Cenote Neyozzote. They say that the water can bring out the best in a branchbearer's glow.

TEXT_BANMAM108_05268_KAGEELJA_000_004<tab>Thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'd be much obliged if you could gather young leaves from trees around Cenote Neyozzote. The soft foliage will provide comfortable beds for our friends.

TEXT_BANMAM108_05268_KAGEELJA_000_005<tab>Thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'd be much obliged if you could retrieve a waterweed fish from Cenote Moxutural. Branchbearers seem to love the things, perhaps due to the fish's affinity with algae. You'll have no trouble reeling one in using golden stonefly nymphs as bait.

TEXT_BANMAM108_05268_KAGEELJA_000_006<tab>I'd be much obliged if you extracted a few vials of energy-imbued water from deposits around Cenote Neyozzote. Let's give the branchbearers all that they need.
TEXT_BANMAM108_05268_KAGEELJA_000_007<tab>I'd be much obliged if you gathered young leaves from trees around Cenote Neyozzote. Let's give the branchbearers all that they need.
TEXT_BANMAM108_05268_KAGEELJA_000_008<tab>I'd be much obliged if you retrieved a waterweed fish from Cenote Moxutural. The fish can be reeled in using golden stonefly nymphs as bait.
TEXT_BANMAM108_05268_KAGEELJA_000_010<tab>Were you able to find what we need?
TEXT_BANMAM108_05268_KAGEELJA_000_011<tab>Ah, this is perfect! Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The branchbearers will be delighted.

TEXT_BANMAM108_05268_KAGEELJA_000_012<tab>The way they chirp and flap their wings when receiving treats never fails to move my heart. Maybe it's an odd thing to say about an expressionless plant, but I think they're cute...

TEXT_BANMAM108_05268_KAGEELJA_000_013<tab>I'll do my best to deepen my understanding of the branchbearers so that we can provide the ideal habitat for them. I hope you'll continue to support our efforts!
